name: monogenic
content:

relating to or controlled by a single gene (= part of a cell that is passed on by your parents and that controls physical development, behaviour, etc.): The research team is trying to identify genes involved in the monogenic forms of the disease. His research demonstrated that diabetes diagnosed in the first few months of life is monogenic. Related word
monogenically
